As the last of the Predicons from the shuttle moved further into the
base the dark intruder slipped from the shadows and looked around. With
a deft movement he placed another pod on a far wall and watched as it
sprung to life, legs sprouting and its head emerging from pod body.

Carefully and silently  he carefully walked into the interior of the
base, consulting both his sensors as well as the view of Hot Rod and
his torturers the first spider-spy was giving him to be sure there
would be no surprises. 

Because while the others where distracted with Hot-Rod, this secretive
being had another goal, and cloaked in silence and shadow he was well
on his way.

Preston
(Da'minion)
